title: Along the track in Central Australia
brief_description: Filmed in 1952 by Phillip Crosbie Morrison and the commentary edited from his recorded talks describing a tour with the Royal Australian Ornithologists’ Union, visiting Hermannsburg, Palm Valley, Ayers Rock and Mount Olga. Gives a broad view of the environment as a whole, emphasising the natural beauty and variety of the region and its wild life and showing that although arid it is not all desert.
